name: Healthy & Delicious: Dijon Tuna Burgers
description: A melange of several existing recipes, these easy fish patties came together in under 30 minutes, using a handful of common ingredients costing around $2. While I enjoyed the balance between tangy mustard, zesty red pepper flakes, and sweet red bell peppers, the recipe is endlessly adaptable.
recipeIngredient: 1 (5-ounce) can albacore tuna in water, drained well
A few grinds fresh black pepper
Whole wheat bread, tomato slices, and lettuce for serving

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine tuna, egg, scallion, red bell pepper, breadcrumbs, mustard, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Shape into 3/4-inch thick patties.

Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Gently place patties in pan. Cook until first side is browned, 4 to 6 minutes. Flip patties very carefully and cook until second side is browned, an additional 4 to 6 minutes.
Serve on toasted whole wheat bread with tomato and lettuce.
